title: The Hickory stick
creator_credit: Irving Jacoby, Mental Health Film Board and National Education Association
brief_description: Demonstrates how a fifth grade teacher maintains an orderly atmosphere for learning and at the same time helps her youngsters cope with their behaviour and learning problems. Shows how she uses firmness and understanding in helping children to control their feelings and accept authority.
creator_credit_for_label: Irving Jacoby, Mental Health Film Board and National Education Association
